mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (no, name, description, reg_date, user_no) SELECT null, #{name}, #{description}, current_date(), (select u.no from category c join user u on c.user_no = u.no where id = #{id} limit 1) FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM category WHERE name=#{name})
mapper.select: select c.no as no, c.name as name, c.description as description from category c join user u on c.user_no = u.no where u.id = #{id} order by reg_date desc
select no, name, description from category where no = #{no}
mapper.delete: delete c from category c join user u on c.user_no = u.no where u.id = #{id} and c.no = #{no}
mapper.select: select distinct c.name from category c join user u on c.user_no = u.no where u.id = #{id}
select c.no from category c join user u on c.user_no = u.no where c.name = #{name} and u.id = #{id}
